MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG2 postcode area of Dumfries, affecting properties in Cargenbridge and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:39am due to a grounded overhead power line and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:40am on Friday, 23 October 2020
